Title: Yes4All Premium Surf Balance Board Trainer with Adjustable Stoppers - 3 Different Distance Options for Improve Balance, Build Strength & Surf Trainer

Description: MASTER CONTROL OF YOUR BODY: The Premium Balance Board Trainer is a simple and practical physical therapy and rehabilitation tool, help to improve core strength, balance, coordination, and muscle memory.

VERSATILE TRAINING TOOL: Surf Balance Board is perfect for boardsports like Surfing, Snowboarding, Skiing, Skateboarding, Standup Paddle, and sports like Basketball, Hockey, Golf, Baseball, etc. This could be a perfect training balance board not only for adults but also for all ages.

CUSTOMIZABLE DIFFICULTY: This Balance Surf Board Trainer can be easily adjusted the distance with 2 removable stoppers for beginners (11, 16, and 22 inches) or remove them for advanced riders.

PREMIUM CONSTRUCTION & COMFORT: Made of 15-ply pressed premium wood, supporting up to 350lbs, with special antiskid PEVA grip for safety and comfort.

SMOOTH & FLOOR-FRIENDLY: The easy-glide wooden roller with a thick TPE layer ensures smooth movement without damaging different types of flooring.
